location_short_descr: A zip-line experience you'll never forget!
location_long_descr: The angel flight is a zip-line connecting two picturesque italian villages - Castelmezzano and Pietrapertosa. Give yourself an adrenaline rush while enjoying Italy's nature in this experience of a lifetime!
details: Via Giuseppe Garibaldi, 4, 85010 Pietrapertosa PZ, Italy
